column4: I know I'm not erUSUL, but it should auto-resume. Mine did, problem was it corrupted some of the files. It's like - for me at least - it just skipped right over certain files and resumed downloading at a different spot.
ah, it's just cause im connected to the wrong wireless router,a nd the signal strength is low
so this is gonna take FOREVER...
I just learned about that kind of stuff! Just because the signal strength is low doesn't mean a poor connection.
